body: Hi Vinu, 1. It's because how you modeled the surface. I just remodeled it (deleted the surface and cap the geometry) and it works as expected. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KWPY3KRntMxvcEtt5rbQ6o7vQdHzTqMbx2SVsQnyk0tgIgvmW6Kx1oOhN-Y91Vf21vXkOPrZC5Y80eNmd87ulnoXVxzs5UPs/Window_Perspective.png) 2. I'm not sure if I understand the question. You can run all the cases that you want one by one and then import the results all together. What is exactly your problem/doubt? Mostapha
